overview:
Jim is Senior Vice President and Chief Marketing Officer, AAA Life Insurance Company.

Life-long life insurance marketer – 28 years of Home Office Marketing assignments with Equitable of NY (now AXA), Prudential (Newark), Liberty Life (RBC Insurance) in Greenville, SC and now AAA Life Insurance.

Background in market research, database marketing, led generation and direct marketing programs, product development, business development and eMarketing.

Lead the team that built and managed the original Prudential.com website –version one isn’t available but here’s what version 2 looked like – designed by CKS Interactive in Cupertino; built one of the first fully automated online Term Insurance products.

external_links.title: RBC TAPS WEB TECHNOLOGY TO ENABLE EXAM-FREE RISK ASSESSMENT
